QAPair.Question: What is (are) Prostate cancer - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on prostate cancer : American Cancer Society -- www.cancer.org/cancer/prostate-cancer.html , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/cancer/prostate/ , National Cancer Institute -- www.cancer.gov/types/prostate , Prostate Cancer Foundation -- www.pcf.org ,
